Name: Escape Memoirs: Mini Stories
About the game: 'Escape Memoirs: Mini Stories' is a series of co-operative escape-room style puzzle scenarios for 1-5 players. In each story, you will face various puzzles that you need to overcome to escape. You must use your wits to their fullest potential to succeed. Jail Breakout (Free): You are a thief who, after an unfortunate turn of events, finds themselves in a jail. Can you conquer the many obstacles that stand in the way of your escape? More chapters will come at a later date.
